tuv.seg: • Making a return and paying Capital Acquisitions Tax
• Ag tabhairt faisnéis cánach agus ag íoc Cáin Fháltais Caipitiúil
If you receive a gift, you may have to pay gift tax on it
Má fhaigheann tú bronntanas, b'fhéidir go mbeidh Cáin Bhronntanais le n-íoc agat air
If you receive an inheritance following a death, it may be liable to inheritance tax
Má fhaigheann tú oidhreacht tar éis báis, b'fhéidir go mbeidh Cáin Oidhreachta le gearradh air
Both these taxes are types of Capital Acquisitions Tax
Is cineálacha Cánach Fháltais Caipitiúil (CFC) iad an dá cháin seo
The benefit (the gift or inheritance) is taxed if its value is over a certain limit or threshold
Gearrtar cáin ar an sochar (an bronntanas nó an oidhreacht) má tá luach thar teorainn nó tairseach áirithe aige
Different tax-free thresholds apply depending on the relationship between the disponer (the person giving the benefit) and the beneficiary (the person receiving the benefit)
Bíonn tairseacha saor ó cháin difriúla i gceist ag brath ar an ngaol idir an teisteoir (an duine a thugann an sochar) agus an tairbhí (an duine a fhaigheann an sochar)
There are also a number of exemptions and reliefs that depend on the type of the gift or inheritance
Tá roinnt díolúintí agus faoisimh éagsúla ann ag brath ar an gcineál bronntanais nó oidhreachta atá i gceist
If you receive a gift or inheritance from your spouse or civil partner, you are exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax
Tá tú díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil má fhaigheann tú bronntanas nó oidhreacht ó do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta
The tax applies to all property that is located in Ireland
Baineann an cháin le gach maoin atá lonnaithe in Éirinn
It also applies where the property is not located in Ireland but either the person giving the benefit or the person receiving it are resident or ordinarily resident in Ireland for tax purposes
Baineann sí freisin le maoin nach bhfuil lonnaithe in Éirinn nuair atá ceachtar den duine a thugann an sochar nó an duine atá á fháil ina chónaí nó ina ghnáthchónaí in Éirinn chun críocha cánach
Gifts and inheritances can be received tax-free up to a certain amount
Is féidir bronntanais agus oidhreachtaí a fháil saor ó cháin suas go dtí méid áirithe
The tax-free amount, or threshold, varies depending on your relationship to the person giving the benefit
Athraíonn an méid saor ó cháin, nó an tairseach, seo ag brath ar an ngaol atá agat leis an duine a thugann an sochar
There are three different categories or groups
Tá trí chatagóirí nó grúpaí difriúla
Each has a threshold that applies to the total benefits you have received in that category since 5 December 1991
Tá tairseach ag gach ceann a bhaineann leis na sochair iomlána a fuair tú sa chatagóir sin ón 5 Nollaig 1991 i leith
Group A applies where the beneficiary, the person receiving the benefit, is a child of the person giving it
Bíonn Grúpa A i gceist nuair atá an tairbhí, an duine a fhaigheann an sochar, mar pháiste ag an té atá á thabhairt
This includes a stepchild or an adopted child
Bíonn leasleanbh nó páiste uchtaithe san áireamh anseo freisin

It can also include a foster child if the foster child resided with and was under the care of the disponer and they provided the care, at their expense, for a period or periods totalling at least 5 years before the foster child reached the age of 18

Is féidir páiste altrama a bheith cuimsithe anseo má chónaigh an páiste altrama leis an diúscróir agus faoina chúram, agus gur chuir sé/sí an cúram ar fáil, ar a c(h)ostas féin, ar feadh tréimhse nó tréimhsí ar a laghad 5 bliana ar an iomlán sular shroich an páiste altrama 18 mbliana d’aois
This minimum period does not apply in the case of an inheritance taken on the date of death of the disponer
Ní bhaineann an íostréimhse seo i gcás oidhreachta a thógtar ar dháta báis an diúscróra
In this case the Group A threshold will apply provided that the foster child had been placed in the care of the disponer prior to that date
Sa chás seo is é tairseach Grúpa A a bheidh i gceist chomh fada is go raibh an páiste altrama curtha faoi chúram an diúscróra roimh an dáta sin
Group A also applies to parents who take an inheritance from their child but only where the parent takes full and complete ownership of the inheritance
Baineann Grúpa A le tuismitheoirí a fhaigheann oidhreacht óna gclann, sa chás go nglacann an tuismitheoir úinéireacht iomlán an oidhreachta amháin
If a parent receives an inheritance where he or she does not have full and complete ownership of the benefit, or if a parent receives a gift, then Group B applies
Má fhaigheann tuismitheoir oidhreacht agus gan úinéireacht iomlán a bheith acu ar an sochar, nó má fhaigheann tuismitheoir bronntanas, bíonn Grúpa B i gceist

If a parent inherits from their child, and have full and complete ownership of the inheritance it is exempt from tax if, in the previous five years, the child took an inheritance or gift from either parent and it was not exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax

Má fhaigheann tuismitheoir oidhreacht óna bpáiste, le húinéireacht iomlán na hoidhreachta acu, bíonn sí díolmhaithe ó cháin más rud é go bhfuair an páiste oidhreacht nó bronntanas ó cheachtar den dá thuismitheoir nach raibh díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil sna cúig bliana roimhe sin
In this case, no tax needs to be paid even if the inheritance from the child is over the threshold
Ní gá cáin ar bith a íoc sa chás seo fiú má tá an oidhreacht ón bpáiste thar an tairseach
Group B applies where the beneficiary is the:
Bíonn Grúpa B i gceist nuair atá an tairbhí mar:
• Parent - see also Group A above
• Thuismitheoir (féach grúpa A freisin)
• Grandchild or great-grandchild - see below
• Duine garchlainne nó iarua - féach thíos
• Nephew or niece of the giver - see below
• Nó mar nia nó neacht ag an té atá á thabhairt - féach thíos
If a grandchild is a minor (under 18 years of age) and takes a gift or inheritance from his or her grandparent Group A may apply if the grandchild's parent is deceased

Má tá an duine garchlainne ina m(h)ionaoiseach (faoi 18 mbliana d'aois) agus má fhaigheann sé/sí bronntanas nó oidhreacht óna s(h)eantuismitheoir is féidir le Grúpa A a bheith i gceist má tá tuismitheoirí an duine garchlainne básaithe
Group A may apply to a nephew or niece if he or she has worked in the business of the person giving the benefit for the previous five years and meets the following criteria:

D'fhéadfadh tairseach Ghrúpa A a bheith i gceist más rud é go raibh nia nó neacht ag obair sa ghnó atá ag an té a thugann an sochar ar feadh na cúig bliana roimhe sin agus go gcomhlíonann sé/sí na critéir seo a leanas:
• The nephew or niece must be a blood relation rather than a nephew or niece-in-law
• Ní mór gur gaol fola atá sa nia nó neacht seachas nia nó neacht trí phósadh
• The gift or inheritance consists of property used in connection with the business, including farming, or of shares in the company
• Is maoin a úsáideadh don ghnó, lena n-áirítear feirmeoireacht, nó scaireanna sa chuideachta, atá sa tabhartas nó san oidhreacht

• If the gift or inheritance consists of property then the nephew or niece must work more than 24 hours a week for the disponer at a place where the business is carried on, or for the company if the gift or inheritance is shares

• Más maoin atá sa tabhartas nó san oidhreacht, ní mór don nia nó neacht oibriú ar feadh níos mó ná 24 uair an chloig in aghaidh na seachtaine don diúscróir san áit a bhfuil an gnó ar siúl, nó don chuideachta más scaireanna atá sa tabhartas nó san oidhreacht
But if the business is carried on exclusively by the disponer, their spouse and the nephew or niece then the requirement is that the nephew or niece work more than 15 hours a week
Má tá an gnó ar bun ag an diúscróir, a gcéile agus an nia nó neacht agus acu sin amháin, ní mór don nia nó neacht oibriú ar feadh níos mó ná 15 uair an chloig in aghaidh na seachtaine
• The relief does not apply if the benefit is taken under a discretionary trust
• Níl feidhm leis an faoiseamh seo má thógtar an sochar faoi iontaobhas lánroghnach
Group C applies to any relationship not included in Group A or Group B
Bíonn Grúpa C i gceist do chaidreamh ar bith nach bhfuil san áireamh i nGrúpa A nó i nGrúpa B

If you receive a benefit from a relation of your deceased spouse or civil partner, you can be assessed with the same group as your spouse or civil partner would be if they were receiving the benefit from their relation

Má fhaigheann tú sochar ó ghaol le do chéile básaithe nó ó ghaol le do pháirtnéir sibhialta básaithe, is féidir measúnú a dhéanamh ort faoin ngrúpa céanna a mbeadh ag do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta dá mbeadh siadsan ag fáil an tsochair óna ngaol
For example, if you receive a benefit from the father of your spouse or civil partner, the group threshold would be Group C
Mar shampla, má fhaigheann tú sochar ó athair do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta, is é an Grúpa C an ghrúpthairseach a bheadh i gceist

But if you receive a benefit from the father of your spouse or civil partner and your spouse or civil partner is deceased, then the group threshold that applies to you would be the same as for a child receiving a benefit from a parent, Group A

Ach má fhaigheann tú sochar ó athair do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta agus do chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta básaithe, ansin bheadh an ghrúpthairseach a bhaineann leat mar an gcéanna leis an tairseach do pháiste atá ag fáil sochar óna t(h)uismitheoir, sé sin Grúpa A
Current CAT thresholds (from 12 October 2016)
Tairseacha CFC ó 12 Deireadh Fómhair 2016

The valuation date is the date on which the market value of the property comprising the gift/inheritance is established
Is é an dáta luachála ná an dáta ar a mbunaítear luach margaidh na maoine atá i gceist sa tabhartas/oidhreacht
In the case of a gift, the valuation date is normally the date of the gift
I gcás tabhartais, is hiondúil gur é dáta na luachála dáta an tabhartais
In the case of an inheritance, the valuation date is normally the earliest of the following dates:
I gcás oidhreachta, is iondúil gur é an dáta luachála an chéad cheann de na dátaí seo a leanas:
• The date the inheritance can be set aside for or given to the beneficiary
• An dáta is féidir an oidhreacht a chur ar leataobh nó a thabhairt don tairbhí
• The date it is actually retained for the benefit of the beneficiary
• An dáta a gcoinnítear é chun sochair an tairbhí
• The date it is transferred or paid over to the beneficiary
• An dáta a n-aistrítear chuig an tairbhí é nó a n-íoctar leis é
The valuation date will normally be the date of death in the following circumstances:
Is hiondúil gurb é an dáta báis an dáta luachála sna himthosca seo a leanas:
• Gift made in contemplation of death (Donatio Mortis Causa)
• Tabhartas a dhéantar nuair a bhíonn duine ag smaoineamh ar an mbás (Donatio Mortis Causa)
• Where a power of revocation has not been exercised
• Sa chás nár úsáideadh cumhacht cúlghairme
This could arise where a person makes a gift of property but reserves the power to revoke, or take back, the gift
D’fhéadfadh sé seo tarlú nuair a dhéanann duine tabhartas maoine ach go gcoinníonn sé/sí an chumhacht an tabhartas a chúlghairm, nó a thógáil ar ais
If he or she dies and this power ceases, the recipient then becomes taxable as inheriting the benefit
Má chailltear é nó í agus go dtagann deireadh leis an gcumhacht seo, bíonn an faighteoir inchánaithe mar dhuine a fuair an sochar mar oidhreacht
If the beneficiary had free use of the benefit before this, he or she will be taxed as receiving a gift of the value of the use of the property
Má bhí úsáid in aisce ag an tairbhí as an sochar roimhe seo, gearrfar cáin air/uirthi mar dhuine a fuair tabhartas de luach úsáide na maoine
The gift or inheritance is valued as the market value at the time you become entitled to the use or benefit of it
Is é an luach atá ar bhronntanas nó ar oidhreacht ná an luach ar an margadh ag an am go mbeidh tú i dteideal úsáid nó leas a bhaint as
The value that is taxable is the market value minus the following deductions
Is é an luach atá inchánach ná an luach ar an margadh lúide na asbhaintí seo a leanas
You can deduct 'any liabilities, costs and expenses that are properly payable
Is féidir 'dliteanais, costais nó speansais ar bith atá iníoctha de réir ceart' a bhaint as
This would include debts that must, by law, be paid and that are payable out of the benefit or because of it
Bheadh fiacha a gcaithfear íoc de réir dlí agus atá le n-íoc ón sochar nó dá bharr i gceist anseo
With an inheritance, these may be funeral expenses, the costs of administering the estate, or debts owed by the deceased
Le hoidhreacht, bheadh costais shochraide, costais riaracháin an eastáit, nó fiacha atá dlite ag an duine mhairbh san áireamh anseo
For a gift, they could include legal costs or stamp duty
Do bhronntanas, d'fhéadfadh costais dlí nó dleacht stampála a bheith san áireamh
If you make a payment for the benefit or some other contribution in return for it, this may also be deducted
Má dhéanann tú íocaíocht as an sochar nó má thugann tú cúnamh nó cabhair eile mar chúiteamh air, is féidir é seo a bhaint as freisin
This is known as a 'consideration' and could be, for example, a part payment, an amount paid annually to the donor or other person, or a payment of debts of the donor
Tugtar 'comaoin' air seo, agus mar shampla d'fhéadfadh páirtíocaíocht, suim a íoctar leis an ndeontóir nó le duine eile go bliantúil, nó íocaíocht as fiacha an deontóra a bheith i gceist
If you do not receive full ownership but instead receive a benefit for a limited period, then a number of factors are taken into account to calculate the value
Má fhaigheann tú sochar ar feadh tréimhse theoranta seachas úinéireacht iomlán a fháil air, tá roinnt fachtóirí a thógtar san áireamh chun an luach a mheas
The calculation of the value of a limited interest is explained in Revenue Guide IT 39 (pdf) (Appendix 7)
Mínítear an chaoi chun luach leasa teoranta a ríomh i dTreoir IT 39 de chuid na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf) (féach Aguisín 7)
Capital Acquisitions Tax is charged at 33% on gifts or inheritances made on or after 5 December 2012 (the rate was formerly 30%)
Sé an ráta caighdeánach ar Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil ná 33% ar bhronntanais nó oidhreachtaí déanta ó mheán oíche an 5ú Nollaig 2012. B’é an ráta ná 30% roimhe sin
This only applies to amounts over the group threshold
Ní bhaineann sé seo ach le suimeanna os cionn na grúpthairsí

For example, if you have received gifts from your parents with a taxable value of €550,000, you only pay tax on the amount over the appropriate group threshold (Group A threshold from 12 October 2016: €310,000)

Mar shampla, más rud é go bhfuair tú bronntanais de €550,000 luach inchánaithe ó do thuismitheoirí, ní íocfá cáin ach amháin ar an méid os cionn na grúpthairsí cuí. (12 Deireadh Fómhair 2016: Grúpa A: €310,000)
So €240,000 is taxed at 33%
Mar sin, gearrfar cáin ag ráta 33% ar €240,000
The following are exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax:
Tá na nithe seo a leanas díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil:
• Gifts or inheritances from a spouse or civil partner
• Bronntanais nó oidhreachtaí ó chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta leat
• Payments for damages or compensation
• Íocaíochtaí cúitimh nó íocaíochtaí ar dhamáistí
• Benefits used only for the medical expenses of a person who is permanently incapacitated due to physical or mental illness
• Sochair a úsáidtear i gcomhair costais leighis amháin do dhuine atá faoi éagumas buan de bharr galar fisiciúil nó meabhrach
• Benefits taken for charitable purposes or received from a charity
• Sochair a thógtar ar mhaithe le carthanacht nó a fhaightear ó charthanas
• Winnings from a lottery, sweepstake, game, or betting
• Airgead buaite i gcrannchur, scuabgheall, cluiche nó gealltóireacht
• Retirement benefits and pension and redundancy payments are not usually liable to Gift Tax
• Go hiondúil ní bhíonn Cáin Bhronntanais le gearradh ar shochair scoir ná ar íocaíochtaí iomarcaíochta nó pinsin
The first €3,000 of the total value of all gifts received from one person in any calendar year is exempt
Tá an chéad €3,000 den luach iomlán ar na bronntanais ar fad a fhaightear ó duine amháin i mbliain na féilire ar bith díolmhaithe
This does not apply to inheritances
Ní bhaineann sé seo le hoidhreachtaí
If you receive a gift or inheritance of a house that has been your main residence, it may be exempt from tax if you do not own or have an interest in any other house
Má fhaigheann tú bronntanas nó oidhreacht a bhí mar phríomháit cónaithe agat, b'fhéidir go mbeadh sé díolmhaithe ó cháin Mura bhfuil aon teach eile nó leas i dteach eile agat
There are conditions on how long you must be resident in the house before and after receiving the benefit
Tá coinníollacha ann maidir leis an dtréimhse ama go gcaithfidh tú a bheith i do chónaí sa teach roimh agus tar éis duit an sochar a fháil
More information is available on this website - see 'Dwelling-house exemption' below - or Revenue's leaflet CAT 10
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil, féach 'Díolúine do theach cónaithe' thíos nó bileog na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim CAT 10)
If a parent receives an inheritance from his/her child, and takes full and complete ownership of the inheritance, it usually taxable under Group A
Má fhaigheann tuismitheoir oidhreacht óna bpáiste agus má ghlacann sé/sí úinéireacht iomlán na hoidhreachta, bíonn sé inchánachfaoi Ghrúpa A go hiondúil
But it is exempt if, in the previous 5 years, the child took an inheritance or gift from either parent and it was not exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax
Ach bíonn sé díolmhaithe más rud é gur thóg an páiste bronntanas nó oidhreacht ó cheachtar den dá thuismitheoir nach raibh díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Chaipitiúil sna cúig bliana roimhe sin
Other exemptions relate to certain Irish Government securities, bankruptcy, heritage property, and support of a child or spouse
Baineann díolúintí eile le hurrúis áirithe de chuid Rialtas na hÉireann, féimheacht, maoin oidhreachta, agus tacaíocht do pháiste nó do chéile
You can get further information on reliefs and exemptions from Revenue
Féach Aguisín 6 de Threoir IT39 na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim i gcomhair tuilleadh eolais maidir leis na heisceachtaí agus na faoisimh thuas
Tax relief applies to gifts and inheritances of business property and reduces the taxable value of the property by 90%
Baineann faoiseamh cánach le bronntanais agus oidhreachtaí ar mhaoin gnó iad agus tugtar laghdú 90% do luach inchánachna maoine
More information on business relief can be found in Revenue leaflet CAT 4
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi faoiseamh gnó sa bhileog na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim CAT 4
Tax relief applies to gifts and inheritances of agricultural property and reduces the market value of the property by 90% for the purposes of Capital Acquisitions Tax
Baineann faoiseamh cánach le bronntanais agus oidhreachtaí ar mhaoin thalmhaíochta iad agus tugtar laghdú 90% do luach inchánachna maoine ar mhaithe le Cáin Fháltais Caipitiúil
More information on agricultural relief can be found in Revenue leaflet CAT 5
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi faoiseamh talmhaíochta sa bhileog na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim CAT 5
Making a return and paying Capital Acquisitions Tax
Ag tabhairt faisnéis cánach agus ag íoc Cáin Fháltais Caipitiúil
If you have received a gift or inheritance then you are responsible for paying any Capital Acquisitions Tax that is due
Más rud é go bhfuil bronntanas nó oidhreacht faighte agat tá tusa freagrach as aon Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil atá dlite a íoc
If you are not resident in Ireland, you must get an agent who is resident in Ireland, such as a solicitor, to take responsibility for the payment of CAT
Mura bhfuil cónaí ort in Éirinn, ní mór duit gníomhaire a fháil a chónaíonn in Éirinn chun freagracht a ghlacadh as CAT a íoc, mar shampla, aturnae a chónaíonn in Éirinn

You must make a tax return if the total value of gifts and inheritances you have received in one of the groups, A, B or C, since 5 December 1991 is more than 80% of the tax-free threshold for that group

Chaithfidh tú tuairisceán cánach a dhéanamh má tá a luach iomlán na bronntanais agus na n-oidhreachtaí atá faighte agat i ngrúpa ar bith, A, B nó C, ón 5 Nollaig 1991 i leith níos mó ná 80% den thairseach saor ó cháin don ghrúpa sin
For example, if you received a gift of €20,000 from a brother and then an inheritance of €10,000 from a grandparent, both of these benefits would come under Group B and amount to a total of €30,000
Mar shampla, más rud é go bhfuair tú bronntanas de €20,000 ó dheartháir leat agus ansin oidhreacht de €10,000 ó sheantuismitheoir, tagann an dá sochar seo faoi Grúpa B agus luach iomlán €30,000 acu
The threshold for Group B is currently €32,500 and 80% of this is €26,000
Is í €32,500 an tairseach do Ghrúpa B agus is é €26,000 80% di seo
Because the benefits you received exceed 80% of the tax-free threshold for Group B, you are required to make a tax return even though the total amount received is below the threshold
Mar gheall go bhfuil na sochair i ngrúpa B os cionn 80% den tairseach saor ó cháin, caithfidh tú tuairisceán cánach a dhéanamh, cé go bhfuil an suim iomlán atá faighte faoin tairseach
Pay and File dates for CAT
Dátaí íoc agus comhdú
Taxable gifts or inheritances with a valuation date on or after 14 June 2010 have a fixed CAT pay and file date
Tá dáta socraithe um íoc agus tuairisciú CAT i gceist le haghaidh bronntanas nó oidhreachtaí a bhfuil dáta luachála tar éis an 14 Meitheamh 2010 nó ar an dáta sin ag baint leo
All gifts and inheritances with a valuation date in the 12-month period ending on the 31 August must be paid and filed by 31 October
Ní mór do gach bronntanas agus oidhreacht lena mbaineann dáta luachála sa tréimhse 12 mhí dár críoch an 31 Lúnasa seo caite a bheith íoctha agus tuairiscithe faoin 31 Deireadh Fómhair
This means, if the valuation date is between 1 January and 31 August, you must complete the tax return and pay the tax on or before 31 October in that year
Dá bhrí sin, má tá an dáta luachála idir an 1 Eanáir agus an 31 Lúnasa, ní mór duit an tuairisceán cánach a chomhlánú agus an cháin a íoc roimh an 31Deireadh Fómhair nó ar an dáta sin, sa bhliain sin
If the valuation date is between 1 September and 31 December you must complete the tax return and pay the tax on or before 31 October in the following year

There is a surcharge for late pay and file of CAT
Tá formhuirear i gceist ar íoc agus tuairisciú déanach CAT
The surcharge is based on a percentage of the total tax payable for the year the return is late and graded according to the length of the delay
Tá an formhuirear bunaithe ar chéatadán den cháin iomlán atá iníoctha don bhliain dá bhfuil an tuairisceán déanach agus bíonn sé grádaithe de réir fhad na moille
However, there is an overall cap on the level of the surcharge which is calculated as follows:
Tá teorainn fhoriomlán ar leibhéal an fhormhuirir a ríomhtar mar seo a leanas:

Gift and inheritance tax returns must be made electronically using Revenue’s Online Service, however there are some exceptions
Ní mór tuairisceáin chánach bronntanais agus oidhreachta a dhéanamh go leictreonach trí úsáid a bhaint as Seirbhís Ar Líne na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim, ach tá roinnt eisceachtaí i gceist leis sin
A new paper gift and inheritance tax return (Form IT38S) will be available but can only be used by you, the taxpayer, if you meet the following criteria:
Beidh foirm nua páipéar do thuairisceán cánach bronntanais agus oidhreachta (Foirm IT38S) ar fáil, ach ní ceadmhach duitse, an cáiníocóir, í a úsáid, mura gcomhlánaíonn tú na critéir seo a leanas:
• You are not claiming any relief, exemption or credit, apart from small gift exemption
• Níl tú ag éileamh aon fhaoiseamh, díolúine nó creidmheas, seachas díolúine do bhronntanas beag
• The benefit taken is an absolute interest without conditions or restrictions
• Is leas iomlán gan coinníollacha ná srianta atá sa sochar atá á ghlacadh agat
• The property included in the return was taken from only one disponer and is not part of a larger benefit
• Is ó dhiúscróir amháin a tógadh an mhaoin a áirítear sa tuairisceán agus ní cuid de shochar níos mó atá ann
In certain circumstances, it is possible to pay the tax by instalments over a period not exceeding 60 months
Is féidir an cháin a íoc i tráthchodanna ar feadh treimhse níos lú ná 60 mhí i gcúinsí áirithe
This applies to any property where the beneficiary does not have full and complete ownership
Baineann sé seo le maoin ar bith nach bhfuil úinéireacht iomlán ag an tairbhí uirthi
It also applies if the benefit is full and complete ownership of the following:

• Property which cannot be moved (for example, lands or a house) or
• Mhaoin do-aistrithe é an sochar (tailte nó teach mar shampla) nó
• Property which can be moved and is agricultural or business property

Is féidir leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncam deacrachtaí airgid a thógáil san áireamh le cead a thabhairt duit aon cháin dlite a chuir siar
Gifts or inheritances with a valuation date before 14 June 2010
Bronntanais nó oidhreachtaí a bhfuil dáta luachála roimh an 14 Meitheamh 2010 ag baint leo

Caithfidh tú an tuairisceán cánach a dhéanamh agus an cháin a íoc taobh istigh de ceithre mhí ó dháta na luachála
You do this by completing Form IT 38 (pdf)

Mura mbíonn an cháin íoctha taobh istigh de 4 mhí, gearrfar ús ort
CAT National Taxpayer Information Unit
An Aonad Náisiúnta Faisnéise CAT do Cháiníocóirí
The following items are exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax:
Tá díolúine ag na hábhair seo a leanas ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil:
• Gifts or inheritances from a spouse or civil partner
• Tabhartais nó oidhreachtaí ó chéile/páirtnéir sibhialta
• Payments for damages or compensation
• Íocaíochtaí as damáistí nó cúiteamh
• Benefits used only for the medical expenses of a person who is permanently incapacitated due to physical or mental illness
• Sochair nach n-úsáidtear ach amháin ar mhaithe le costais leighis duine atá éagumasaithe go buan mar gheall ar thinneas coirp nó ar meabhairghalar
• Benefits taken for charitable purposes or received from a charity
• Sochair a ghlactar ar chúiseanna carthanacha nó a fhaightear ó charthanacht
• Winnings from a lottery, sweepstake, game, or betting
• Airgead a bhuaitear i gcrannchur, i scuaibín, i gcluiche nó ar ghealltóireacht
• Reasonable support for the maintenance or education of a child or spouse/civil partner
• Tacaíocht réasúnta chun leanbh nó céile a chothabháil nó chun oideachas a chur orthu
Houses, gardens or objects that are of national, scientific, historic or artistic merit and meet certain conditions (see 'Heritage Property Relief' below)
Tithe, gairdíní nó réada a bhfuil fiúntas náisiúnta, eolaíochta, stairiúil nó ealaíonta ag baint leo, agus a chomhlíonann coinníollacha áirithe (féach ‘Faoiseamh ar Mhaoin Oidhreachta’ thíos)
Pension and redundancy payments are not usually liable to Gift Tax
Ní hiondúil go mbíonn Cáin Bhronntanais dlite ar phinsin ná ar íocaíochtaí iomarcaíochta

If the employee however is a relative of the employer, or the employer is a private company and the employee is deemed to control the company, Revenue may disallow this exemption if they consider the payment excessive

Má tá gaol ag an bhfostaí leis an bhfostóir, áfach, nó más cuideachta phríobháideach é an fostóir agus go meastar go bhfuil smacht ag an bhfostaí ar an gcuideachta, is féidir leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim an díolúine seo a dhícheadú má cheapann siad go bhfuil an íocaíocht iomarcach
The first €3,000 of the total value of all gifts received from one person in any calendar year is exempt
Tá díolúine ag an gcéad €3,000 de luach iomlán na dtabhartas ar fad a fhaightear ó dhuine amháin in aon bhliain féilire ar bith
This does not apply to inheritances
Ní bhaineann sé seo le hoidhreachtaí

If a parent receives an inheritance (with full and complete ownership), from a child, it is exempt from tax if the child had taken an inheritance or gift from either parent in the previous five years and that inheritance or gift was not exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax

Má fhaigheann tuismitheoir oidhreacht (le húinéireacht iomlán) óna leanbh, tá sé díolmhaithe ó cháin má fuair an leanbh oidhreacht nó tabhartas ó cheachtar tuismitheoir sna cúig bliana roimhe sin agus nach raibh an oidhreacht nó an tabhartas sin díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil
Payments that reduce the debt of a bankrupt or near-bankrupt are usually exempt (Section 82, Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003)
Is hiondúil go mbíonn díolúine ag íocaíochtaí a laghdaíonn fiacha duine atá féimheach nó gar a bheith féimheach (Alt 82 den Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003)
Other exemptions relate to government securities or unit trusts where the beneficiary is non-resident
Baineann díolúintí eile le hurrúis rialtais nó iontaobhais aonaid ina bhfuil an tairbhí neamhchónaitheach
See Appendix 6 of Revenue guide IT 39 (pdf) for further information on the above reliefs and exemptions
Féach Aguisín 6 de threoir na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim IT 39 (pdf) chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoi na faoisimh agus na díolúintí thuas
A gift or inheritance of a house which has been your main residence may be exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax if you do not own or have an interest in any other house
D’fhéadfadh tabhartas nó oidhreacht tí a bhí mar phríomháit chónaithe agat a bheith díolmhaithe ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil mura bhfuil úinéireacht nó leas agat in aon teach eile
You must have lived in the house as your main residence for the three years immediately preceding the date of the gift or inheritance
Ní mór go raibh tú i do chónaí sa teach seo mar do phríomháit chónaithe ar feadh na trí bliana díreach roimh dháta an tabhartais nó na hoidhreachta

However, in the case of gifts taken on or after 20 February 2007, time you lived in the house will not be counted if it was also the disponer's only or main residence, unless, the disponer was dependent on your care because of old age or illness

I gcás tabhartas a tógadh an 20 Feabhra 2007 nó dá éis, ní dhéanfar an tréimhse ina raibh cónaí ort sa teach a chomhaireamh má bhí sé mar phríomháit chónaithe nó mar an t-aon áit chónaithe a bhí ag an diúscróir, mura raibh an diúscróir ag brath ar do chúram mar gheall ar sheanaois nó ar thinneas
Also the house must be owned by the disponer for three years if it is a gift taken on or after 20 February 2007
Ina theannta sin, ní mór don teach a bheith faoi úinéireacht an diúscróra ar feadh trí bliana más tabhartas é a tógadh an 20 Feabhra 2007 nó dá éis

If the house replaced another house as your main residence in that time, you can still claim the exemption provided that your main residence was in these houses for a total period of three out of the four preceding years

Má fuair tú an teach mar do phríomháit chónaithe in áit teach eile le linn na tréimhse sin, is féidir leat an díolúine a éileamh chomh fada agus go raibh do phríomháit chónaithe i gceann de na tithe seo ar feadh tréimhse iomlán trí bliana as na ceithre bliana roimhe sin
However, in the case of gifts taken on or after 20 February 2007, each house must be owned by the disponer for the relevant part of the 3 year period that it was occupied by you
I gcás tabhartas a tógadh an 20 Feabhra 2007 nó dá éis, áfach, ní mór gach teach a bheith faoi úinéireacht an diúscróra le linn an chuid ábhartha den tréimhse 3 bliana a raibh cónaí ort ann
You must continue to occupy the house as your main residence for the following six years but this condition does not apply if you are over 55 years at the time of receiving the benefit

Ní mór duit cónaí a bheith ort sa teach mar do phríomháit chónaithe ar feadh sé bliana ina dhiaidh sin, ach ní bhaineann an coinníoll seo leat má bhí tú os cionn 55 bliana d’aois nuair a fuair tú an sochar
If you are away because of an obligation to work abroad you can include this as time resident
Má tá tú as baile mar gheall ar oibleagáid chun oibriú thar lear, is féidir leat é seo a chomhaireamh mar am a raibh cónaí ort ann

Where the house is replaced by another property as your main residence, the time for which each house is your main residence must total six of the seven years commencing on the date of the gift or inheritance

Sa chás go bhfaigheann tú maoin eile in áit an tí atá agat mar do phríomháit chónaithe, ní mór go raibh na tithe seo mar do phríomháit chónaithe ar feadh sé bliana as na seacht mbliana ag tosú ar dháta an tabhartais nó na hoidhreachta
If you sell the house and the sale does not meet the conditions outlined above then the relief will be withdrawn
Má dhíolann tú an teach agus nach gcomhlíonann an díolachán na coinníollacha atá leagtha síos thuas tarraingeofar siar an faoiseamh
An exception to this is if the property is sold because you need long-term care in a hospital or nursing home
Eisceacht sa chás seo ná má dhíoltar an mhaoin mar gheall go dteastaíonn cúram fadtéarmach uait in ospidéal nó i dteach altranais
If you sell the house within six years and the value of a replacement property is less than the value of the original property then there will be a clawback of the difference
Má dhíolann tú an teach taobh istigh de shé bliana agus go bhfuil luach an áitribh a cheannaíonn tú ina áit níos lú ná luach an bhun-áitribh, aisghlámfar an difir eatarthu

For example, if the original relief was for a property worth €600,000 and you sell this to buy a property worth €400,000, you will only be allowed relief on the €400,000 and there will be a clawback on the €200,000 difference

Mar shampla, má bhí an chéad fhaoiseamh d’áitreabh arbh fhiú €600,000 é agus má dhíolann tú é seo chun áitreabh ar fiú €400,000 é a cheannach, ní cheadófar faoiseamh duit ach ar an €400,000 agus aisghlámfar an difir €200,000
You will need to complete a revised form IT 38 and pay the additional tax within four months
Beidh ort foirm athbhreithnithe IT 38 a chomhlánú agus an cháin bhreise a íoc taobh istigh de cheithre mhí
Gifts and inheritances of agricultural property can qualify for relief that reduces the market value of the property by 90% for the purposes of Capital Acquisitions Tax
Is féidir le tabhartais agus oidhreachtaí de mhaoin talmhaíochta cáiliú i gcomhair faoisimh a laghdaíonn luach margaidh na maoine de 90% ar mhaithe le Cáin Fháltais Caipitiúil
To qualify for Agricultural Relief the beneficiary must be a farmer
Ní mór don tairbhí a bheith ina f(h)eirmeoir ionas go gcáileoidh sé/sí don fhaoiseamh
This means that taking the gift or inheritance into account, agricultural property must account for at least 80% of the gross market value of your assets on valuation date

Ciallaíonn sé seo, ag tógáil an tabhartais nó na hoidhreachta san áireamh, nach mór do mhaoin talmhaíochta a bheith ionann le 80% ar a laghad d’oll-luach margaidh do chuid sócmhainní ar dháta na luachála
This restriction does not apply if the gift or inheritance is trees or underwood
Níl an srian seo i gceist más crainn nó roschoill atá sa tabhartas nó san oidhreacht
If your principal residence is not situated on the farm it does not qualify as agricultural property
Mura bhfuil do phríomháit chónaithe lonnaithe ar an bhfeirm ní cháilíonn sí mar mhaoin talmhaíochta
However borrowings on such a residence can be offset against its value
Is féidir, áfach, iasachtaí i gcomhair áit chónaithe den chineál seo a fhritháireamh i gcoinne a luach
This may reduce the value of assets that are non-agricultural, increasing the proportion of agricultural assets for the 80% rule
D’fhéadfadh sé seo luach na sócmhainní nach mbaineann le talmhaíocht a laghdú, rud a mhéadódh comhréir na sócmhainní talmhaíochta don riail 80%
The relief will be withdrawn:
Déanfar an faoiseamh a aistarraingt:
• If the beneficiary is not resident for all of the three tax years following the tax year in which the valuation date falls
• Mura bhfuil an tairbhí cónaitheach ar feadh na trí bliana cánach iomlána i ndiaidh na bliana cánach ina dtiteann dáta na luachála
• If the property is sold within six years and not replaced by another agricultural property with one year
• Má dhíoltar an mhaoin taobh istigh de shé bliana agus nach bhfaightear maoin talmhaíochta eile ina áit taobh istigh de bhliain amháin
• If the property is compulsorily purchased within six years and not replaced within six years
• Má cheannaítear an mhaoin go héigeantach taobh istigh de shé bliana agus nach gceannaítear ceann eile ina áit taobh istigh de shé bliana
If a beneficiary does not qualify for Agricultural Relief, then agricultural property can qualify for Business Relief
Mura gcáilíonn tairbhí do Fhaoiseamh Talmhaíochta, d’fhéadfadh maoin talmhaíochta cáiliú do Fhaoiseamh Gnó

If Agricultural Relief or Business Relief has been granted on the development value of development land, the relief will be clawed back if the land is disposed of between six to ten years after the date of the gift or inheritance

Má thugtar Faoiseamh Talmhaíochta nó Faoiseamh Gnó ar luach forbartha an talaimh fhorbraíochta, aisghlámfar an faoiseamh má dhiúscraítear an talamh idir sé agus deich mbliana i ndiaidh dháta an tabhartais nó na hoidhreachta
Development land is land with a value that exceeds the current use value of the land at the date of the gift or inheritance
Is éard atá i dtalamh forbraíochta ná talamh le luach níos airde ná luach úsáide reatha an talaimh ag dáta an tabhartais nó na hoidhreachta

In calculating the taxable value of the propery after agricultural relief, only 10% of the value of the allowable deductions are taken into account (that is, the deductions are reduced by 90%, in proportion with the relief)

Nuair atá luach inchánaithe na maoine i ndiaidh faoiseamh talmhaíochta á ríomh, ní thógtar ach 10% de luach na n-asbhaintí ceadaithe san áireamh (is é sin le rá, laghdaítear na hasbhaintí de 90%, i gcomhréir leis an bhfaoiseamh)
For more information on Agricultural Relief is available in IT 39 (Appendix 2) or Section 89 of Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi Fhaoiseamh Talmhaíochta ar fáil in IT 39 (Aguisín 2) nó Alt 89 d’Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003
Gifts and inheritances of relevant business property qualify for relief that reduces the taxable value of the property by 90% for the purposes of Capital Acquisitions Tax
Cáilíonn tabhartais agus oidhreachtaí roinnt maoin gnó ábhartha i gcomhair faoisimh a laghdaíonn luach inchánaithe na maoine de 90% chun críocha Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil
Relevant business property includes the following
Cuimsíonn maoin ghnó ábhartha iad seo a leanas
The business or, for a business carried on by a sole trader or by a partnership, an interest in the business
An gnó, nó, i gcás gnó atá ar bun ag trádálaí aonair nó ag comhpháirtíocht, leas sa ghnó
A "Business" is defined as one which is carried on for gain and it includes the exercise of a profession or vocation as well as a trade
Is é an sainmhíniú atá ar “Ghnó” ná gnó a dhéantar ar mhaithe le brabús agus cuimsíonn sé cleachtadh gairme chomh maith le ceird
Individual assets used in the business, such as a factory will not qualify for the relief if they are transferred to the beneficiary without the business
Ní bheidh sócmhainní aonair a úsáidtear sa ghnó, cosúil le monarcha, incháilithe don sochar má aistrítear chuig an tairbhí iad d’uireasa an ghnó

The unquoted shares or securities of a company carrying on a business provided that the company is incorporated and that the shares meet certain requirements specified in section 93 of Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003 and outlined in IT 39 (Appendix 3)

Scaireanna nó urrúis neamhluaite cuideachta atá i mbun gnó chomh fada is go bhfuil an chuideachta ionchorpraithe agus go gcomhlíonann na scaireanna riachtanais áirithe atá sainithe in alt 93 den Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003 agus leagtha síos in IT 39 (Aguisín 3)

Any land or buildings, machinery or plant in the State that are owned by the disponer but used wholly or mainly for the purpose of a business carried on by a company controlled by the disponer or by a partnership of which the disponer was a partner

Aon tailte nó foirgnimh, innealra nó gléasra sa Stát atá faoi úinéireacht an diúscróra ach a úsáidtear go hiomlán nó den chuid is mó ar mhaithe le gnó atá ar bun ag cuideachta atá faoi smacht an diúscróra nó faoi smacht comhpháirtíochta a raibh an diúscróra ina chomhpháirtí de
The shares in the company or the partnership interest must be taken by the beneficiary together with the lands, buildings, machinery or plant in order for those assets to qualify for the relief

Ní mór don tairbhí na scaireanna sa chuideachta nó an leas comhpháirtíochta a ghlacadh chomh maith leis na tailte, na foirgnimh, an t-innealra nó an gléasra ionas go gcáileoidh na sócmhainní sin don fhaoiseamh
Quoted shares or securities of a company if the shares were unquoted before 23 May 1994 or if later, were unquoted at the time the disponer became the beneficial owner
Scaireanna nó urrúis luaite cuideachta má bhí na scaireanna neamhluaite roimh an 23 Bealtaine nó má tharla sé níos déanaí, go raibh siad neamhluaite tráth a raibh an diúscróir ina úinéir tairbhiúil
Quoted shares or securites must meet the same requirement specified for unquoted shares in order to qualify for relief
Ní mór do scaireanna nó urrúis luaite an riachtanas céanna atá sonraithe do scaireanna neamhluaite a chomhlíonadh ionas go gcáileoidh siad i gcomhair faoisimh
Businesses are excluded from the relief if they wholly or mainly consist of dealing in currencies, securities, stocks, shares, land or buildings, or making or holding investments
Tá gnólachtaí eisiata ón bhfaoiseamh más láimhseáil airgeadra, urrúis, stoic, scaireanna, tailte nó foirgnimh ar fad nó is mó atá ar bun acu, nó déanamh nó coinneáil infheistíochtaí

The relevant business property must have been in continuous ownership by the disponer for a minimum period of two years in the case of an inheritance which was taken on the death of the disponer or five years in any other case

Ba chóir an mhaoin ghnó ábhartha a bheith faoi úinéireacht leanúnach an diúscróra ar feadh tréimhse dhá bhliain ar a laghad i gcás oidhreachta a tógadh nuair a fuair an diúscróir bás nó cúig bliana in aon chás eile
This period can include a period of ownership by the disponer's spouse or a trustee
Is féidir tréimhse faoi úinéireacht chéile an diúscróra nó iontaobhaí a bheith san áireamh sa tréimhse seo
A replacement of a relevant business property can be included in the ownership requirement, in which case the minimum periods are extended to three and six years respectively
Is féidir athsholáthar ar mhaoin ghnó ábhartha a bheith san áireamh sa riachtanas úinéireachta, agus sa chás sin bíonn íostréimhsí trí bliana agus sé bliana i gceist faoi seach

In the case where a beneficiary receives a gift or inheritance that meets the minimum period requirement but they then die before they in turn have owned it for the minimum period, the subsequent inheritor of the benefit can still qualify business relief under the minimun period condition

Sa chás go bhfaigheann tairbhí tabhartas nó oidhreacht a chomhlíonann an riachtanas íostréimhse ach go bhfaigheann siad bás sula mbíonn úinéireacht acu ar an maoin don íostréimhse, is féidir leis an té a fhaigheann an sochar mar oidhreacht ina dhiaidh sin cáiliú i gcomhair faoisimh ghnó faoin gcoinníoll íostréimhse
For more information on Business Relief see section 92 Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil faoi Fhaoiseamh Gnó féach alt 92 den Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003
Houses and gardens or objects that are of national, scientific, historic or artistic interest are exempt from Capital Acquisitions Tax if they meet certain conditions
Tá díolúine ag tithe agus gairdíní nó réada a bhfuil fiúntas náisiúnta, eolaíochta, stairiúil nó ealaíonta ag baint leo ó Cháin Fháltais Caipitiúil má chomhlíonann siad coinníollacha áirithe
Reasonable facilities for viewing must be available to members of the public or, in the case of objects, to recognised bodies or associations
Ní mór áiseanna réasúnta féachana a bheith ar fáil don phobal, nó, i gcás réada, do chomhlachais nó do chumainn aitheanta
The property must not be used for trading purposes
Ní féidir an mhaoin a úsáid ar mhaithe le trádáil
Houses and gardens must have had reasonable facilities available for their viewing by the public for three years before a gift or inheritance
Ní mór áiseanna réasúnta féachana a bheith ar fáil don phobal i dtithe agus i ngairdíní ar feadh trí bliana roimh thabhartas nó oidhreacht
The property must not be sold within six years unless the sale is to a national institution by private treaty. The relief can be clawed back if the conditions are not kept
Ní féidir an mhaoin a dhíol taobh istigh de shé bliana murar le hinstitiúid náisiúnta a dhíoltar é faoi chonradh príobháideach
For more information on Heritage Property Relief see Revenue leaflet CAT 8
Is féidir an faoiseamh a aisghlámadh mura gcloítear leis na coinníollacha
